Title: The Odyssey
Description: An epic poem attributed to Homer, detailing the adventures of Odysseus as he returns home from the Trojan War.

Title: To Kill a Mockingbird
Description: A novel by Harper Lee exploring themes of racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

Title: The Road
Description: A post-apocalyptic novel by Cormac McCarthy that follows a father and son's journey through a devastated landscape.

Title: A Brief History of Time
Description: Stephen Hawking's book explaining cosmology, black holes, and the nature of the universe for a general audience.
